name: @swanfactory/hclang
description: Homoiconic C - a universal data format for computation
author: Ernest N. Prabhakar, Ph.D.

tasks.doc:bs: tail +3 -q hc/BitScheme.hc > doc/BitScheme.adoc && asciidoctor doc/BitScheme.adoc && open doc/BitScheme.html
tasks.tag: deno run -A scripts/bump-version.ts && git add deno.json src/version.ts && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git tag v$(jq -r .version deno.json) && git push origin --tags
tasks.tag:minor: deno run -A scripts/bump-version.ts --minor && git add deno.json src/version.ts && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git tag v$(jq -r .version deno.json) && git push origin --tags
tasks.test: deno fmt && deno lint --fix && deno test --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write
